topic.title: Zite backend?
topic.body: Hi! If this is server-less how can I do a secure backend where I handle "server" logic of the dynamic website without exposing it to the client?

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Hi! If this is server-less how can I do a secure backend where I handle "server" logic of the dynamic website?
